pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with His Majesty the King of the Belgians | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with His Majesty the King of the Belgians in Brussels, Belgium.

The Prime Minister thanked King Philippe for Belgiumâ€™s role in shipping vaccines to Canada to help in the fight against the COVID-19 pandemic. The Prime Minister and the King discussed a number of international issues, including the importance of the rules-based international order.

Prime Minister Trudeau and King Philippe spoke about the strong economic and trade ties between Canada and Belgium, including the important role that the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) has played in expanding trade. The Prime Minister and the King discussed opportunities to further strengthen bilateral economic relations, and looked forward to keeping in touch.
